name: Introduction to Astronomy
description: This course is an introduction to the study of astronomy, including the celestial sphere, star observation and measurement, solar system dynamics, and the history of our understanding of the universe.

name: Solar System Astronomy
description: This course is an introduction to the study of the solar system, including the planets, moons, asteroids, comets, and other small bodies that inhabit our local corner of the universe.

name: Exoplanetary Systems
description: This course is an introduction to the study of exoplanetary systems, including the discovery of exoplanets, their characterization, and their habitability.

name: Stellar Astronomy
description: This course is an introduction to the study of stars, including their formation, evolution, and death.
